page.title: 07REBECCA'S WEEKEND
page.content: { I get up at about half past seven, and eat my breakfast. I get washed and dressed, then go to the dump with my Dad, to throw away any rubbish. The dump is on Canvey, at Small Gains. When we get back I usually play out in the garden for a while, until my cousins come round. Then we go in the paddling pool if it's sunny. About lunch time we have a barbecue, which my uncle cooks. For lunch we have chiken,kebabs and sausages. After lunch we usually go back in the paddling pool for a while. The grown-ups sit in the garden, talking. When it starts to get dark and cold we go indoors and watch television until it's time for my cousins to go home. They live close to me, so it doesn't take them long to get home. Then it's bedtime for me.
